title: Damages, future earnings
context: ยง663-8 Damages, future earnings. Together with other damages which may be recovered by law, the legal representative of the deceased person may recover where applicable under section 663-7 the future earnings of the decedent in excess of the probable cost of the decedent&rsquo;s own maintenance and the provision the decedent would have made for the decedent&rsquo;s actual or probable family and dependents during the period of time the decedent would have likely lived but for the accident. [L 1973, c 213, ยง3; am L 2016, c 55, ยง46] Case Notes Recovery by decedent&rsquo;s estate, discussed. 823 F. Supp. 778 (1993).
